content:
Pietro Albini said:

ugh I miss "person is typing" :/

Maybe bring it up in #zulip ? I think there's an employee that hangs out in there?

https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/subsystems/typing-indicators.html

Right now typing indicators are only used in “Private Messages” views. :thinking:

The most likely big change to typing indicators is that we will add them for stream conversations. This will require some thought for large streams, in terms of both usability and performance.

so a known issue but won't be implemented in the short term
Typing indicators was one of the first places that Discord used Rust for, right? Just need to sell Zulip on it :-)
